Module com.example.pt2025_30422_larisa_pasca_assignment_3
Package businessLogic

Class ProductBLL

java.lang.Object
businessLogic.ProductBLL
public class ProductBLL extends Object
Business Logic Layer for managing product operations. This class handles adding, updating, deleting, and fetching products, as well as checking and decrementing product stock.

      public boolean isStockSufficient(int productId, int quantity)
      Checks if there is enough stock for a specific product.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
